articles.content: It is a combination of frightening and enraging that some of the coaches, athletes and professional sports teams in this country care more about the safety and well-being of their fellow human beings… [+5318 chars]

articles.title: Indy 500: IMS says local fans can watch live through Peacock Premium - IndyStar
articles.description: Not going to Sunday's Indy 500, but want to be able to watch the race live? Live in Central Indiana? You can via a subscription to Peacock.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS -- For the third consecutive year and fourth time in seven years, Central Indiana race fans will be able to watch the Indianapolis 500 live on TV.
